title: WATCH — New school scaries? Get pro tips from Canadian teens
text:
From channeling your inner Beyoncé to avoiding toilet paper on your shoe

Many kids are out trying to squeeze the last few drops from summer right now, but there’s no denying it: the first day of school is almost here.

That might mean that you’re getting to know new classmates and new teachers.

But what about starting at a new school altogether?

Yikes. That’s especially intimidating.

Who better to give advice than teens who’ve been there?

We asked Canadian kids from across the country to answer this question: What I wish I’d known on my first day at a new school.

Watch the video at the top of the page to hear their pro tips.
description: Heading into your first day at a new school? Here are some pro tips from Canadian teens who’ve been there.
